snippet: Douglas Durst, a man of few words, great wealth and dynastic power over Manhattan real estate, has said virtually nothing in public about his older brother, Robert. Until now.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column recounts his discussion with Douglas Durst, head of one of New York City's wealthiest and most powerful real-estate dynasties, about his older brother Robert; notes Douglas has broken his long silence about his brother as Robert is now subject of Andrew Jarecki and Marc Smerling HBO documentary The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst, and fears his father Seymour's image will suffer for it.
lead_paragraph: Douglas Durst, a man of few words, great wealth and dynastic power over Manhattan real estate, has said virtually nothing in public about his older brother, Robert. Until now.

headline.print_headline: Real Estate Titan Sees Brother Wielding a New Weapon: TV
headline.seo: Douglas Durst, in Rare Move, Speaks About Robert Durst Ahead of HBO Documentary
headline.main: Real Estate Chief Fears Troubled Sibling Has New Weapon: TV
